==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|}}, from {{inh|de|goh|riohhan}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*reukaną}}. Compare {{cog|en|reek}}, {{cog|nl|rieken}}, {{cog|da|ryge}}, {{cog|sv|ryka}}.
